timelineItems.name: Brian Clay Johnson

timelineItems.name: Kevin Morooney
timelineItems.text: Woke up.Swore at clergy. Stole car.Burned flag.Getting ready to watch #FRAvGER . Doing my part for USA moral decay. #WorldCup

timelineItems.text: Schurlle certainly having one of those days #FRAvGER

timelineItems.text: LULZ "@soccergods: Well, that didn’t take long. #PutALeashOnNeuer #FRAvGER http://t.co/BUyPUuArsu"

timelineItems.name: Footybedsheets
timelineItems.text: LULZ "@soccergods: Well, that didn’t take long. #PutALeashOnNeuer #FRAvGER http://t.co/BUyPUuArsu"

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Olivier Giroud (France).
Mats Hummels (Germany) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Keith Heggaton
timelineItems.text: #FRAvGER has been largely underwhelming. Poor first touches from Les Bleu and crappy services. #FifaWorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: denise yzabel
timelineItems.text: Let's go Germany! Finish this match strongly! Never concede a goal! #GER #FRAvGER

timelineItems.comment: Blaise Matuidi (France) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sami Khedira (Germany).

timelineItems.name: Kate Innocent
timelineItems.text: At least Lloris has brightened up this game with his love of all things yellow #FRAvGER

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Olivier Giroud (France).
André Schürrle (Germany) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Mike Kirkham
timelineItems.text: Don't know if it's down to #GER being brilliant or #FRA not being bothered. But you can't see a French goal in this now. #WorldCup #FRAvGER

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Paul Pogba (France).
Mario Götze (Germany) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: William Harvey
timelineItems.text: Giroud is merely a slightly better version of Emile Heskey. He's been excellent for Germany since he came on. #FraVGer

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Thomas Müller (Germany).
Mathieu Debuchy (France) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Karim Benzema (France) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Olivier Giroud.

timelineItems.name: William
timelineItems.text: BENZEMA OHH #FRAvGER

timelineItems.name: Babaloo
timelineItems.text: My heart, my heart. #FRAvGER

timelineItems.name: Jaideep Chakrabarty
timelineItems.text: Manuel Neuer is not human.... #FRAvGER

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, France 0, Germany 1.

timelineItems.name: SystematicChaos
timelineItems.text: Je suis desole les bleus...!! :( #FRAvGER

timelineItems.name: _Paige ☮☯
timelineItems.text: Germany is throoooouuuuggggghhhh!!! Brilliant save by Neuer to seal the deal!! :D :D #FRAvGER #WorldCup2014 #FIFA2014

timelineItems.name: Dave
timelineItems.text: Disappointing 2nd half expected to see a couple more goals #WorldCup2014 #FRAvGER #Quarterfinals

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Pitazo final: Alemania 1-0 Francia. Con solitario gol de Mats Hummels al minuto 12, los alemanes pasan a las semifinales #FRAvGER

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: #GER edge #FRA 1-0 + advance to their 4th consecutive #WorldCup semifinal: http://t.co/MBK9sZ4Z6N #FRAvGER http://t.co/HvnKQlEXGS
